text: "Mama's Song" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her third studio album, Play On (2009). ==Music video== The music video for "Mama's Song" was directed by Shaun Silva. It premiered on VEVO on September 24, 2010. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for two consecutive weeks in November 2010. ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Carrie Underwood songs Category:Music videos directed by Shaun Silva
title: Mama's Song
